data.text: @Devin_Heroux Congratulations on your arrival and speedy transit through the airport! How is your body clock? Still on Beijing time?! Heading to bed myself. Have a great afternoon getting settled in 👍🏻❤️🇨🇦🥌
@Devin_Heroux Update on the coffee sitch once you’re settled ☕️
@Devin_Heroux The Olympics viewership boomed during the first part of the games. Now, with the #war - I can’t imagine things turning around unfortunately.
